item.title: TDD Money Step-by-Step in C#
item.description: While preparing a TDD workshop, I ported Kent Beck‘s Money example from the book “Test-Driven Development by Example” to C# using .NET Core I’ve tried to map each change described in the book to a dedicated git commit with a sensible commit message.
